Description.LocalizedString:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
  • Survivors in a Drone's Active Zone suffer from 20% smaller skill checks. This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the area.

A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
  • Survivors in a Drone's Active Zone suffer from the Blindness status effect. This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the area.

    • Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

The drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
  • While in a drone's active zone, gain a 2% Haste status effect and a 15% action speed bonus to breaking pallets and breakable walls, damaging generators, and vaulting. These effects linger for 15 seconds after leaving the area.
    • Haste increases Killer movement speed.

A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
  • Decreases the Activate drone cooldown by 10%.

The drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
  • Increases the lingering duration of the Undetectable status effect by 20%.
    • Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
  • Increases the Unhackable state duration of Drones by 10%.

The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
  • Increases the battery life of Claw Traps by 20%.

Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
  • Survivors in a Drone's Active Zone have no skill check warning. This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the area.

By intermittently powering off and on non-vital components, the drone can stay on for longer.
  • Increases the duration of a Drone's Active Mode by 10%.

Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
  • Claw Trapped Survivors you hit suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects until fully healed.
    • Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

An additional process in the drone’s programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
  • Increases the speed at which Lock On builds up inside drone active zones by 10%.

An ominous hum disseminates from the drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
  • Survivors in a drone's active zone suffer from the Oblivious status effect. This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the area.
    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the drone, and it seems like it make fall at any minute, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
  • Survivors in a Drone's Active Zone suffer from the Exhausted status effect. This effect lingers for 3 seconds after leaving the area.
    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
  • Anytime a Claw Trap is removed, the Survivor's aura is revealed for 4 seconds.

Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
  • Survivors that enter a Drone's Active Zone suffer from a 5% Hindered status effect for 3 seconds.
    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Even after they leave the zone of influence, a refined AI program predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
  • Survivors that enter Drone's Active Zone have their auras revealed for 6 seconds.

A high-frequency noise blaster that resonates with many organic materials, causing them to break down much sooner than expected.
  • Survivors with a Claw Trap destroy pallets when fast vaulting them. Claw Traps with an empty battery gauge are destroyed when fast vaulting a pallet.

The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries. Recharging is not recommended.
  • All Survivors start the trial with a Claw Trap. Increases the battery life of the starting Claw Traps by 150%. These Claw Traps do not recharge and are automatically destroyed when their battery is empty.

The cutting-edge design allows the drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
  • Gain a 5% Haste status effect when entering a Drone's Active Zone triggered by a Survivor.
  • This effect does not stack and can only trigger once per Active Drone.
  • This effect is lost when hitting a Survivor.
    • Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Before he disappeared, Adriana’s father had started a newer, darker manga, Sonhadores Sombrios.
  • Activating a Drone causes it to gain a 32-meter Terror Radius for 15 seconds. This effect can only be applied to one Drone at a time.
  • Increases the activation cooldown by 25%.
    • “When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!” – Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1
